links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
mathematica: lst = Range[1, 600, 2]; i = 2; While[ i <= (len = Length@lst) && (k = lst[[i]]) <= len, lst = Drop[lst, {k, len, k}]; i++ ]; Rest@lst - Most@lst (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 12 2006 *)
prog: (Haskell)a031883 n = a031883_list !! (n-1)a031883_list = zipWith (-) (tail a000959_list) a000959_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 11 2015
